devdoc.details: Supports ETH and USDC bidding with anti-sniping protection

params.isUSDC: Whether to accept USDC instead of ETH
params.name: Domain name (without .id)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: IDDomainAuction

bid(uint256).notice: Place a bid on an ETH auction

cancelAuction(uint256).notice: Cancel an auction with no bids

createAuction(string,uint256,uint256,boo.notice: Create a new auction for a premium name

createAuctionBatch(string[],uint256[],ui.notice: Batch create auctions for multiple names

getMinBid(uint256).notice: Get minimum next bid for an auction

hasActiveAuction(string).notice: Check if name has active auction

settle(uint256).notice: Settle an ended auction and register the name to winner

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw pending returns from being outbid

userdoc.notice: English auction system for premium .id domain names
